text: nissandeh tumhaara rab vahee allaah hai, jisane aakaashon aur dharatee ko chhah dinon mein paida kiya, phir sinhaasan par viraajamaan hokar vyavastha chala raha hai. usakee anugya ke bina koee sifaarish karanevaala bhee nahin hai. vah allaah hai tumhaara rab. atah usee kee bandagee karo. to kya tum dhyaan na doge
